name: Investigate Data Leakage Alert (Symantec CloudSOC)
description: Investigate data leakage alert  ingested from Symantec CloudSOC

message.content: The user {{vars.steps.Lookup_User_Details.data.entries[0].attributes.cn}} has been disabled from Active  Directory. Email notifications sent to Product and Legal Team.
Querying Symantec DLP for additional DLP Events involving user: {{vars.steps.Lookup_User_Details.data.entries[0].attributes.cn}}

steps.name: Find if user in watch list

message.content: {% if vars.result | length==0 %}  User: {{vars.userName}} was not found on Employee Watchlist{%else%}User: {{vars.userName}} found on Employee Watchlist with status: {{vars.result[0].status.itemValue}} {%endif%}

steps.name: Raise the Severity of the Alert

message.content:
Sensitive File Exfiltration Detected
Initiating Containment Actions

params.content:
Attention,

Sensitive file exfiltration detected. Please find the details below:

User: {{vars.steps.Lookup_User_Details.data.entries[0].attributes.cn}}

Files: {{vars.exfiledFile}} 

 

Thanks & regards,

Vsoc Team

message.content: Email notification of sensitive file exfiltration to Legal and Engineering teams.

steps.name: Note for task completion of revoking file permission

resource.content: File Permissions revoked successfully, and User blocked in Cloud.SOC

message.content: {% if vars.result %}Sensitive file {{vars.result[0].fileName}} identified in Symantec.CloudSOC Alert.{% else %}No sensitive files identified in alert.{% endif %}

arguments.name: Symantec DLP

steps.name: Manual Task for Inline block on Cloud SOC

message.content:
Added manual tasks for:
1. Blocking the user in CloudSOC 
2. Revoking File Permissions

arguments.name: Active Directory

message.content:
Investigating data leakage from :

User's Email ID : {{vars.input.records[0].userDetails}}

 

Active Directory Details:
User's Name : {{vars.result.data.entries[0].attributes.cn}}
Domain Name : {{vars.result.data.entries[0].dn}}

steps.name: Manual Task for revoking File permission

routes.name: Escalate and Close Alert -> Email Notification
Add user as Observablea -> Find if user in watch list
Deactivate User from AD -> Manual Task for Inline block on Cloud SOC
Buffer Step -> Search Incident in DLP
Note for task completion of revoking file permission -> Copy  of Escalate and Close Alert
Search Incident in DLP -> Copy  of Search Incident in DLP
Fetch Incident Details -> Create Additional Alerts
Find if user in watch list -> Find Intellectual Property
Manual Task for revoking File permission -> Copy  of Note for task completion of Block User
Find Intellectual Property -> Were sensitive files involved
Email Notification -> Copy  of Lookup User Details
Lookup User Details -> Add user as Observablea
Manual Task for Inline block on Cloud SOC -> Manual Task for revoking File permission
Were sensitive files involved -> Raise the Severity of the Alert
routes.label: Sensitive Files Involved

routes.name: Were sensitive files involved -> Buffer Step
routes.label: No Sensitive Files

routes.name: Deactivate User from AD -> Search Incident in DLP
